channel.title: Sounds by wolfsgoal

item.title: Sounds by wolfsgoal
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

wolfs goal only explained how to make sounds for special attacks, example:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){ AttackingOn2.specGFX(341); specialAmount -= 50; frame174(1081, 000, 030); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(1658); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false;
Okay, what i am trying to do is to make sounds with non special, ive tried lots of ways.. Anyone? help?

Read full topic
